#summary The architecture of pyfse is described here.

= Introduction =

The architecture consists of:
 * ActionContainer
 * Controller

==ActionContainer==

AC are classes that house actions to be performed when a change of state occurs.
They are referenced through Controller objects.

==Controller==

A Controller implements the _business logic_ of the state engine.

=Flow=

{{{
 (current_state, event) -> (next_state, action)
}}}

Enter_State
Leave_State
